resources.string: Please go to KAA 218 to begin the tour.
Welcome! This app was created to showcase what Bluetooth Low Energy beacons can do. This will be a guided tour of the Kaaike building. Have fun!
In room 218, there will be presentations as well as Counseling
Financial aid is located here in room 219

This is our IT department, here we also create a lot of Cybersecurity projects. 

Check out 
http://maui.hawaii.edu/cybersecurity/
Have some food! There will be a Q/A with the Advisory board here in room 210
Go to room 109, lots of cool projects there!

Take a look at the ABIT projects being showcased


 http://mauisweetnspicy.com
http://waiifoods.com
http://themauicookielady.com
http://josephinesmaui.com
Thank you for time! Brought to you by the UHMC Cybersecurity Team
